# Packages needed
packages loaded by this app are:
tidyverse, DESeq2,

```{r load-packages, include = FALSE}
#load libraries
library("tidyverse")
library("DESeq2")
library("ggplot2")
#library("hexbin")
library("genefilter")
library("pheatmap")
library("cluster")
#library("factoextra")
library("RColorBrewer")
library("shinythemes")
library("shiny")
library("knitr")
```
# Input your files for DESeq2

Input the file containing info for your samples. This should be a tab-separated file containing the colData for DESeq2.

```{r sample_info-file-input, echo = FALSE}
fileInput(inputId = "sample_info",
          label = "URL or path to Sample Info File")
```

Input your read Count file. This should ideally be the output from RNA_DMC.

```{r count-file-input, echo = FALSE}
fileInput(inputId = "counts_file",
          label = "URL or path Count file from RNA_DMC")
```
```{r ls}
observe({
  print( input$sample_info )
  print( input$counts_file )
})
```

```{r read-inputfiles, echo = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
if ( !exists("input") ){
  cat("No files uploaded")
```
